text: Don Quixote, in love like a child of Dulcinea del Toboso, was to marry her. On the eve of the wedding, the bride showed him her scarf, on each of whose pieces she had embroidered her monogram. When the gentleman saw all those intimate springs marked with the three atrocious initials, he lost his mind. Fin 1966
title: Proposición sobre las verdaderas causas de la locura de don Quijote
author: Marco Denevi
